name: PHATurator
headline: Make tracks feel expensive in 10 seconds. Bigger, louder, richer saturation you can track through - with offline-ready licensing, fast A/B shortcuts, and a lightweight CPU footprint.
discountText:
No iLok. No always-online checks. Full-feature trial with a brief audio watermark.
Reduced price only applies to Founder's Month, 1-28 February 2026

items.title: Stacking saturations has never been this easy.
items.text:
Get the weight and character of high-end outboard gear at the click of a button. Top engineers routinely layer analogue gear to achieve richer harmonics, depth, and controlled grit. We've distilled the essence of that analogue signal chain into one intuitive tool.

No complex setup, no learning curve - just use your ears, and mix with instinct and emotion.

items.title: Six styles of timeless saturations.
items.text:
We didn't just emulate the tone, we captured the real analogue behavior.

From the snappy punch of British consoles to the creamy warmth of 70s preamps and vintage tape glue, these six algorithms are indistinguishable from the hardware. They breathe, break up, and react to your dynamics with the same musicality and emotion as the original units.

items.title:
Zero Latency.
Featherlight.
Essential.
items.text:
We've removed the friction of legacy software: no dongles, no internet requirements, no barriers to your workflow. Engineered for maximum speed and efficiency, our plugins are light enough for huge sessions, and fast enough for real-time tracking.

It's just you and your sound, exactly as it should be.

audio.title: Experience The Difference
audio.subheader: Need weight, thickness and presence? Listen to it for yourself.

testimonials.quote: It looks fantastic and is really easy to navigate. The layout is really intuitive so the learning curve was very minimal. I really enjoyed that the finer details were more tucked away so you have the option of getting more nerdy if you want to but the initial instance is quite simple.
testimonials.author: Sam Bloor

testimonials.quote: I think PHATurator is gonna be one of those level game changers for a lot of people. I literally can't work without it now! I use it on pretty much every track - I think it creates so much more depth and definition between instruments and being able to dial in different flavours at the same time is so useful.
testimonials.author: Bob Cooper
testimonials.bands: Nai Harvest, Self Defense Family, Rob Lynch

testimonials.quote: I used it on a bass that was too spiky sounding, so I stacked up distortions to soften the transient and then used the filter to round it off. Ended up with a really fat, round bass sound.
testimonials.author: Jim Pinder
testimonials.bands: Sleep Token, Bring Me The Horizon, Bullet For My Valentine

items.title: Dynamic guitars
items.text: Put your guitars back in the spotlight. Whether you're needing to add life, energy, or character, PHATurator offers the spank you're looking for.

items.title: Thicker, punchier drums
items.text: Adds weight and analogue density, with no digital harshness.

items.title: All your saturation needs in one plug-in
items.text: From injecting a sprinkle of energy to a lifeless source with subtle studio-grade saturation, to completely warping its character into something entirely new, the flexibility within PHATurator's Clean, PHAT & PHATTER modes can take you from 0 to 90% with just a couple of simple moves.

items.title: Bloomy basses
items.text: No more small, sterile lows. Give your mix a solid anchor with in-depth, finely tuned low-end control.

items.title: Own your loops
items.text: Whether they're vibey or hard hitting, stamp your personality on your loops with PHATurator's endless unique possibilities and combinations. Your own style is just a twist of a knob away.

items.title: Lush vocals
items.text: Push your vocals forward in the mix, giving them presence and naturally smoothing any transients or spikeness.

items.title: Zero Latency
items.text: Track through it. Mix with it. Perform live with it. No delay.

items.title: Lightweight on CPU
items.text: Put it on every channel. We optimized the DSP for maximum instance count.

items.title: Offline Licensing
items.text: Install. Authorize once: offline supported. It works forever. No internet checks.

items.a: PHATurator is an analogue-modeled multi-stage saturation plugin. Unlike standard saturators that offer just one flavour, PHATurator lets you stack and blend six distinct analogue circuits - from Tube and Tape to FET and Class A Preamp styles - to colour your sound with rich harmonics, depth, and controlled grit. It also features a global Mix knob for instant parallel processing.

PHATurator includes six distinct saturation algorithms:
  • FET: Detector-driven dynamics (76-style feel) for punch and control.
  • TUBE: Classic tube saturation to make sources fuller and harmonically rich.
  • TAPE: Vintage glue, tasty saturation, and subtle stereo width.
  • PUNCH: Large-format British console saturation with tight low end, snappy transients, and assertive upper mids.
  • PHAT: Fuller low-mid punch with pleasing compression-like behaviour. Very loudness-friendly.
  • WARMTH: Thick, transformer-rich 70s British Class A preamp vibe with creamy low mids.

items.q: What formats does it come in?
items.a: We provide VST3, AU (Audio Unit), and AAX formats for both Mac and Windows.

items.q: Does it work on M1/M2/M3 Macs?
items.a: Yes. PHATurator is fully native for Apple Silicon chips (M1, M2, M3 etc) as well as Intel Macs. No Rosetta required.

items.q: What DAWs does it work on?
items.a: It works in any DAW that supports VST3, AU, or AAX plugins. This includes Logic Pro, Pro Tools, Ableton Live, Cubase, Studio One, FL Studio, Reaper, and Bitwig.

Mac: macOS 10.13 or higher (Intel or Apple Silicon).
Windows: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit).
General: 4GB RAM required (8GB recommended), 20MB free disk space.

items.q: How many computers can I install it on?
items.a: Our license allows for 3 simultaneous activations per user (e.g. your studio machine, your laptop, and a travel rig).
Yes, you can download a trial from our Downloads page. The trial version has all features of the full version, but inserts a short silence every 30 seconds.
Yes, you can read the full User Manual here.

overview.title: Precision Limiting
overview.card1Text: Crystal clear limiting with zero latency.
overview.description1: LeONE is a dual limiter with zero latency, making it very useful for tracking and live work.
overview.description2: With a Release envelope that can move from 2 seconds all the way to 0.01 milliseconds, brutal limiting with LeONE is perfectly possible.
overview.card2Text: Advanced options are there at the click of a button when you need them.
overview.card3Text: Designed for live tracking and performance.

overview.title: Explosive FET
overview.card1Text: Explosive FET compression with instant attack.
overview.description1: We went back to all the classic FET compressors that we know and love, and created the FIERY from the best unique elements of each.
overview.description2: The two transformers - pre and post compression - activate our unique Analogue Drift Recreation (ADR) algorithm.
overview.card2Text: Switch between classic saturated tones and modern punch.
overview.card3Text: Recreates the analogue movement found in hardware units.
